trans-unit.source: Represents a header or footer that is associated with a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" />.
trans-unit.target: 代表與 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> 相關聯的頁首或頁尾。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter> provides header and footer information for the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner> when it is displayed in print preview mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter> 顯示在列印預覽模式時，為 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner> 提供了頁首和頁尾資訊。

trans-unit.source: If provided by the workflow designer, users can configure headers and footers on the **Header/Footer** tab on the **Page Setup** dialog box.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供的工作流程設計工具，使用者可以設定頁首和頁尾上**頁首/頁尾**索引標籤上**版面** 對話方塊。

trans-unit.source: The SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner with which the
trans-unit.target: SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner，透過它，

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to indicate that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> is a header; <see langword="false" /> to indicate that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> is a footer.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 可以判斷 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> 為頁首；<see langword="false" /> 則可以判斷 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> 為頁尾。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the root designer to which the header or footer is applied.
trans-unit.target: 取得頁首或頁尾套用到的根目錄設計工具。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> to which the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> is applied.
trans-unit.target: 套用到 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowRootDesigner" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle of the header or footer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 取得工作流程設計介面上的頁首或頁尾週框。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that bounds the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: 在工作流程設計介面上包圍 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image associated with the header or footer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定關聯於頁首或頁尾的影像。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> to associate with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />.
trans-unit.target: 要與 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle for the image associated with the header or footer.
trans-unit.target: 取得與頁首或頁尾關聯之影像的週框。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the bounds for the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Image" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，定義與 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Image" /><see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />關聯之 的週框。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.ImageRectangle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何覆寫 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.ImageRectangle%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.ImageRectangle%2A> is calculated using the Bounds of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter> to draw the image in the upper left corner of the header/footer.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，會使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.ImageRectangle%2A><xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter>的界限來計算 以繪製頁首/頁尾左上角的影像。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> when the elements it contains are repositioned by the user.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者重新調整其包含項目的位置時，會告知 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Draws the header or footer associated with the workflow root designer on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 繪製與設計介面上工作流程根目錄設計工具關聯的頁首或頁尾。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="e" /> contains a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="e" /> 包含 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text description associated with the header or footer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定關聯於頁首或頁尾的文字描述。

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the text description associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含與 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" /> 關聯之文字描述的字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bounding rectangle for the text associated with the header or footer.
trans-unit.target: 取得與頁首或頁尾關聯之文字的週框。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the bounds for the <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />，定義與 <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.Text" /><see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter" />關聯之 的週框。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.TextRectangle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例將示範如何覆寫 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.TextRectangle%2A> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.TextRectangle%2A> is calculated using the Bounds of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter> as well as the location and size of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.ImageRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 在此範例中，會使用 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.TextRectangle%2A> 的繫結以及 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter> 的位置和大小，計算 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialWorkflowHeaderFooter.ImageRectangle%2A>。
